pages.text: Yohoia is a tiny megacheiran from the middle Cambrian period which is characterized by a segmented body with frontal grasping appendages and many rows of legs on its body. It was suggested to be a mainly benthic feeder.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
